jltl2dstar

Class APMonom

  • java.lang.Object
    • jltl2dstar.APMonom

  • public class APMonom
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a subset of 2^AP where AP is the set of atomic propositions (APSet). It stores two bits per AP: One bit to determine if the value of this AP is set, the second bit to store the value.
    Additionally, the APMonom can have the special values TRUE or FALSE.
